content: Please post your Troubleshooting Information. At the top right of the Thunderbird window, click the menu button â‰¡, then select Help > More Troubleshooting Information. Press the "Copy text to clipboard button" and paste the information into your reply.
creator: christ1

content:
The recipient has exceeded message ra

Thankfully you cut off the error message.

No action is required on your part. Delivery attempts will continue for some time, and this warning may be repeated at intervals if the message remains undelivered. Eventually the mail delivery software will give up, and when that happens, the message will be returned to you.

So the problem is at the recipients end. Talk to them.
creator: christ1

content: Sounds like that system has other problems that should be looked into beyond just Thunderbird. You can always grab the latest release from thunderbird.net and install it over the currently installed version. The installer will upgrade the outdated version. Consider a repair-install of Windows 10 to fix that system.
creator: stancestans
